Definition.WordDefinition: registered adj 1: (of animals) officially recorded with or certified by a recognized breed association; especially in a stud book; "a registered Percheron" [ant: {unregistered}] 2: listed or recorded officially; "record is made of `registered mail' at each point on its route to assure safe delivery"; "registered bonds" [ant: {unregistered}] 3: (of a boat or vessel) furnished with necessary official documents specifying ownership etc
